publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3710 Sarah Boyack: Social and Environmental Accountability and Investment—That the Parliament notes the proposal in the Make Poverty History campaign manifesto that “we need to [make companies] more accountable for their social and environmental impact both here and abroad”; notes that this proposal is echoed in the priorities suggested by the Trade Justice Movement for UK action in advance of the December 2005 World Trade Organisation meeting; notes campaigns at UK and Scottish levels for legislation to require enhanced transparency from companies and to ensure that companies are held legally accountable for the social and environmental impacts of their business operations both in the United Kingdom and overseas; welcomes the Scottish Executive’s commitment to make Scotland a fair trade country, and notes strong support for the Executive to take a lead in supporting high standards of corporate behaviour within Scotland by the promotion and implementation of socially responsible procurement and investment practices throughout the public sector.

S2M-3710 Sarah Boyack: Social and Environmental Accountability and Investment—That the Parliament notes the proposal in the Make Poverty History campaign manifesto that “we need to [make companies] more accountable for their social and environmental impact both here and abroad”; notes that this proposal is echoed in the priorities suggested by the Trade Justice Movement for UK action in advance of the December 2005 World Trade Organisation meeting; notes campaigns at UK and Scottish levels for legislation to require enhanced transparency from companies and to ensure that companies are held legally accountable for the social and environmental impacts of their business operations both in the United Kingdom and overseas; welcomes the Scottish Executive’s commitment to make Scotland a fair trade country, and notes strong support for the Executive to take a lead in supporting high standards of corporate behaviour within Scotland by the promotion and implementation of socially responsible procurement and investment practices throughout the public sector.
